pages.text: Dimensional Dungeons allows you to enter a dimension entirely made of random dungeons. To do this, you will need to use a Blank Portal Key on an End Portal Frame. This one key will always bring you to one specfic dungeon. You will then need to build a portal with Gilded Portal Blocks, a Portal Keystone, and Stone Bricks.
$(italic)Note that this preview will always face East but the portal can be in any direction
Activating a key, the shape of a portal, and an activated portal

You can't break blocks here, and must solve puzzles using only your wit. Mobs here constantly drop Gems, so you will probably want a Gem Bag.$(br2)$(italic)If for some reason mobs aren't dropping gems, force give yourself the advancement packdata2:dungeondim
